page.title: 11HOUSING
page.content: PITFIELD DRIVE HOUSES, Pitfield Drive is a quiet road situated in the centre of Meopham off the Wrotham Road.When first built over 25years ago houses cost 5500,the bungalows 4400.The brick built houses and bungalows have tiled roofs.No houses are for sale at the current price of 55000. We interviewed a resident of Longfield Hill who lived in a terraced house on the main Longfield road.The housewas built 110years ago,as a result of the development of the railway.Many of the houses in this row had been abandoned and some of them had been vandalized. A building survey on White Post Lane showed the following:- 13-bungalows, 6-houses,2-shops,1-recreational. 90% of the buildings were bungalows. 90% had gardens.
